alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Pine; South Aitkin; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:46AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FREEZING DRIZZLE AND FLURRIES OVER NORTHEAST MINNESOTA AND NORTHWEST WISCONSIN THIS MORNING... Areas of freezing drizzle and snow flurries are expected through 8 AM over much of northeast Minnesota and northwest Wisconsin. The freezing drizzle may create slippery stretches on area roads, elevated surfaces, and sidewalks. Use caution if traveling early this morning and be prepared for changes in pavement conditions. Locations in Minnesota which may experience freezing drizzle early this morning include Cook, Orr, Ely, Grand Rapids, Hibbing, Virginia, Biwabik, Isabella, Grand Marias, Grand Portage, Cotton, Hill City, Floodwood, Twig, Cloquet, Duluth, Aitkin, McGregor, Moose Lake, Hinckley, and Pine City. In Wisconsin locations include Superior, Solon Springs, Bayfield, Washburn, Cable, Ashland, Mellen, Hurley, Mercer, Grantsburg, Siren, Spooner, Trego, Hayward, Park Falls, and Phillips.
